content: This is Inspector Arjun from the Cyber Cell. Your bank account is linked to a money laundering case. Immediate verification is mandatory. Click http://verify-secure-bank.com within 10 minutes or a digital arrest warrant will be issued.

subject: URGENT: Account Suspended
content: Dear user, your account has been temporarily suspended due to suspicious activities. To avoid legal action and arrest, verify your KYC now: https://paytm-secure.co.in/kyc

subject: Acknowledgement of ITR Filing
content: Thank you for filing your Income Tax Return for AY 2025-26. This is an automated acknowledgement.
